testcase.name: Looking up the definition of '<word>'

failure.message: Expected: a collection containing a string containing "The fruit of the watermelon plant, having a green rind and watery flesh that is typically bright red when ripe and contains black pips." but: was "A tropical American evergreen tree, Carica papaya, having large, yellow, edible fruit", was "The fruit of this tree.", was "An orange colour, like that of papaya flesh. papaya: "
